    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomSplitPane

        protected CustomSplitPane(java.awt.Component leftUpperComp,
                          java.awt.Component rightLowerComp,
                          java.awt.Component dividerComp,
                          int orientation)
        Custom split pane class constructor. Create a horizontally or vertically divided split pane using the specified components. If no divider component is provided then the divider blends in with the dialog background. If a component is specified then the divider is displayed using the supplied component
        Parameters:
        leftUpperComp - component to display in the left or upper side of the split pane
        rightLowerComp - component to display in the right or lower side of the split pane
        dividerComp - component to display in place of the divider; null to create a hidden divider
        orientation - JSplitPane.HORIZONTAL_SPLIT to split the pane horizontally or JSplitPane.VERTICAL_SPLIT to split the pane vertically
